missionVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
missionVision.intro: InteriMed was founded with a clear goal: to revolutionize healthcare recruitment in Switzerland by creating a platform that addresses the specific needs of healthcare facilities and professionals.

experienceSection.title: Our Experience
experienceSection.paragraph1: With over 50 years of combined experience in the healthcare sector, our team understands the unique challenges faced by healthcare facilities in finding qualified staff.
experienceSection.paragraph2: This expertise has allowed us to develop a platform that simplifies the recruitment process.

insightSection.title: Our Insight
insightSection.paragraph1: We believe that the future of work in healthcare will be increasingly flexible.

points.title: Quality:
points.text: We rigorously verify the qualifications and experience of all professionals on our platform.

points.title: Innovation:
points.text: We continuously invest in technology to improve user experience and recruitment efficiency.

points.title: Transparency:
points.text: We believe in clear and honest communication with all our partners.

missionVision.conclusion: By choosing InteriMed, you're selecting a partner who understands the nuances of the Swiss healthcare sector.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: InteriMed was founded by two pharmacists with technical expertise and strong industry relationships.
story.paragraph2: After personally experiencing the challenges of finding qualified staff, they set out to create a solution.
story.paragraph3: Starting with the pharmaceutical sector in French-speaking Switzerland, InteriMed aims to become the leading platform.
